sentences.en: an awareness of the importance of eating a healthy diet
sentences.cn: 认识到健康饮食的重要性

sentences.en: He was full of his own importance (= he behaved in an annoying way which showed that he thought he was very important ).
Her approval was of supreme importance.
sentences.cn: 她的认可是至关重要的。

sentences.en: His speech emphasized the importance of attracting industry to the town.
sentences.cn: 他的发言强调了吸引工业到城镇的重要性。

sentences.en: Horrigan launched into a speech about the importance of new projects.
sentences.cn: 霍里根就新项目的重要性慷慨陈词。

sentences.en: Many visitors complained of his bad manners and self-importance.
sentences.cn: 许多拜访者抱怨他高傲无礼。

sentences.en: My great-grandfather was a person of some importance here.
sentences.cn: 我曾祖父曾是这儿的头面人物。

sentences.en: Research and teaching are of equal importance.
She stressed the importance of careful preparation.
sentences.cn: 她强调了认真准备的重要性。

sentences.en: Some have minimized the importance of ideological factors.
sentences.cn: 有些人淡化了意识形态因素的重要性。

sentences.en: The importance of being an Olympian will vary from athlete to athlete.
sentences.cn: 参加奥运会对每个运动员而言意义不同。

sentences.en: The importance of education cannot be overemphasised.
sentences.cn: 教育的重要性怎么强调都不为过。

sentences.en: The island is of strategic importance to France.
sentences.cn: 该岛对法国来说具有重要的战略意义。

sentences.en: They have a stronger appreciation of the importance of economic incentives.
sentences.cn: 他们对经济激励的重要性有了更深的理解。

sentences.en: Today's elections are of no great importance in themselves.
sentences.cn: 今天的选举本身并不是很重要。

words.tran_cn: 重要的，重大的；有地位的；有权力的
重要地；大量地；有名望地；自命不凡地
进口，进口货；输入；意思，含义；重要性
意义,后果,价值,重力,压力,紧迫性
高位,权力,威严,显要,骄傲自大

phrases.tran_cn: 重视；着重于…；对…给予重视
狂妄自大的，自视甚高的
有着重要意义，十分重要
重要的；具有重要意义的
